macro_name HP_ACC

binary_name aCC

lang_flags "-AA -ext +eh -z"
optimization_flags "+O2"
warning_flags "+w"
shared_flags "+Z"

<mach_abi_linking>
hppa1.0 -> "+DAportable"
hppa1.1 -> "+DA1.1"
hppa2.0 -> "+DA2.0W"
</mach_abi_linking>

<so_link_commands>
default -> "$(CXX) +Z -b -Wl,+h,{soname_abi}" # Documented in cc(1), but not CC(1) (?)
</so_link_commands>
